GSD.description:
net: sfp: fix memory leak in sfp_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.253 by commit 1545bc727625ea6e8decd717e5d1e8cc704ccf8f. For more details please see the references link.
